channel.title: Kids these days
channel.description:
Alright so,
some kid.. wants to fight me.. because I asked him... wait for it...
if he was a ninja.
wtf?
how do i even respond to this? he comes up to me after school today with 2 of his goofy looking friends and says i talk shit on wrestlers cause i asked if he was a ninja... so now tomorrow I'm supposed to go to the park with 2 of my friends that they also don't like for stupid reasons to fight (while I have strep throat btw)
Like, I know I can hold my own in a fight, i've been in my fair share and have done enough years of ju juro and boxing to put the hurting on this kid but.. i dont want to? haha its for such a stupid reason...and i'm on unsupervised probation so i can't afford to get in trouble... and get this, he's at least 5 inches shorter than me. he looks up to talk to me. i'm 6 ft, he's i'm guessing, 5 ft 3 or 4. ballsy little fucker
anyways, you guys ever have any stupid encounters anything like this?

[/quote][/quote]

item.title: Kids these days
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Yo mama is like Home Depot, 5 cents a screw.
Yo mama is so poor she walked through the front door and tripped over the back gate.
Yo mama is so stupid she bumped a sticky.
Yo mama is so ugly she is constantly confused with the Elephant Man.

item.title: Kids these days
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:22, topic:432518”][quote author=Mack n cheese link=topic=535229.msg3913883#msg3913883 date=1329000289]

If it’s gonna go down make sure it’s filmed and uploaded so we can all have some jolly good banter
[/quote]well im not gonna go out of my way to fight such a stupid fight, so if it does happen, he’ll have to say something to piss me off, and the only time i see him is at school. if it gets recorded, i’d be amazed, but i’ll let you guys know if anything happens

Just say umadbro over and over.

Or use your mom jokes, for example:

Your mom is so fat, the only time she sees 90210 is when she steps on the scales. that when she stepped on the scale it showed her phone number
your mamma is like geico so easy a caveman can do it
your mamma is like a doorknob, everyone gets a turn
Yo mama so poor she can’t afford to pay attention!
Yo Momma is like a bus only 2.50$ a ride
yo mama is so fat when she step on the Weight Scales it says…‘to be continued’…[/quote]

Read full topic

In other words, There is no point of fighting, fighting a kid smaller and winning makes you a bigger man? it doesn’t.
What if he has brack relatives that are boxers and murders you and eats uu fresh?
Wath fi eh ttckaas first? tenwat? nad he bring a caihnasw and ktus u up?[/quote]

item.title: Kids these days
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

The planned fights are always fucking stupid. One faggot doesn’t want to fight and tries to avoid it and then nothing ever happens and it is just a waste of time. The best fights are the spontaneous ones, that’s where all the rage comes out. Go fuck that kid up and then post the video on moparscape for all of us to watch.
